text: Medieval Greek (also known as Middle Greek or Byzantine Greek) is the stage of the Greek language. It was spoken from 330 to 1453, mostly in the Byzantine Empire. ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * * ==Other websites== * Use of Greek in the Byzantine Empire * Grammar of Medieval Greek Project (1100â€“1700), University of Cambridge * Early Modern Greek blog (mainly in Greek) Category:4th-century establishments Category:1450s disestablishments Category:Greek language Category:Languages of Europe
title: Medieval Greek
